title: Flip Watch Face
summary: Watch Face with 3D Flip features has arrived!

description: New Watch Face with 3D flip features has arrived!LESS is more.SIMPLICITY of design at its best.FUNCTIONALITY without unnecessary complexity.Carefully designed and animated to flip up in 3D, watching the animations by the minute can be a pleasure on its own!It is time to fall in love with your watch with this elegant and simple watch face.
descriptionHTML:
New Watch Face with 3D flip features has arrived!

LESS is more.
SIMPLICITY of design at its best.
FUNCTIONALITY without unnecessary complexity.

Carefully designed and animated to flip up in 3D, watching the animations by the minute can be a pleasure on its own!

It is time to fall in love with your watch with this elegant and simple watch face.
comments: It has one big problem Liked the idea, but for me the big problem is I have the display turned off (to extend battery life), so when I tap the screen at first I see a incorrect time before it updates.
Price is right. I wish there were options I wish I could modify it to my preference. Get date, day, battery level, other things.  But its free and it does the job.
Awsome Perfect watch face, my one and only issue is that I can't change out of 24 hour format, would rate 5 stars with that option
Looks cool Great watch face, I wouldn't mind having some settings to change from 24hr time to 12hr time. The animation is a nice touch.
Kinda garbage No 12 hour mode?! I'm stuck with a 24hr digital clock?
Finally! OK, I'm lame and nostalgic. It's basic, simple, and simply perfect.
